data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Prakasam that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh, India.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, make bold the prophets in Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh, India so that the church can be equipped with truth and insight and a vision of your heart.
data.verse: These are the things which you should do: speak the truth to one another; judge with truth and judgment for peace in your gates.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bania Irupathi Nalu Manai Chetti people.
Father, for those in trouble in the county of Prakasam prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Prakasam, Andhra Pradesh, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, help the 37,371 believers in Prakasam to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 3,360,029 lost friends and neighbors.

location.name: Prakasam
location.people_groups_list: Bania Komti, Yadav Gola, Musti Chenchu, Madiga Penda, Bandi (Muslim traditions)
